txt.en: Gríss Stonesmasher would like to teach some of his students how to forge weapons out of bronze and wants you to bring him some of the pieces.

'Hello there! Do you have an ear to lend a teacher of weaponsmithy? I am glad to hear it, for time is precious and should not be wasted in dull conversation!

'I have need of several examples of bronze craftwork I can use to teach some pupils of mine the art of weaponsmithing. I have other demands on my time and cannot spend it preparing the examples.

'If you bring me two bronze blades and two bronze hilts, I will give you some coins for the favour, and a few leftover materials I do not plan on using.'

Gríss Stonesmasher is in the Forging Hall inside Thorin's Hall.\n\nGríss Stonesmasher asked you to bring him two bronze blades and two bronze hilts for him to use as examples for some of his weaponsmithy pupils.
'These will do, I suppose. Here are the coins and materials I promised you. My pupils should be able to learn one lesson or another from studying these blades and hilts.'

Gríss Stonesmasher is in the Forging Hall inside Thorin's Hall.\n\nGríss Stonesmasher asked you to bring him two bronze blades and two bronze hilts for him to use as examples for some of his weaponsmithy pupils.
'I can teach anyone to be a skilled weaponsmith!'
'I still need two bronze blades and two bronze hilts. Have you forgotten?'
Bring bronze blades and bronze hilts to Gríss Stonesmasher
